sign-in.legal.tos_prefix: By creating an account, you agree to our
sign-in.hero.subtitle: Chat with specialized expertise - Experience AI with complete data protection with us
sign-in.password.reset.title: Reset your password
sign-in.intro.sign_in: Sign in with your email and password. If you’ve already set up a passkey, you can log in using your smartphone and FaceID or TouchID.
sign-in.intro.create: Create your secure mentalhealthGPT account with your email and a strong password. In the next step, you’ll set up your biometric passkey on your smartphone.
sign-in.hero.title: Unlock the power of your private mental health AI
sign-in.create.error.password_too_short: Password is too short. Please use at least 12 characters.
sign-in.create.error.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
sign-in.create.error.technical: Technical error while creating the account.
sign-in.create.error.email_already_regis: This email address is already registered. Please sign in or use a different address.
sign-in.create.error.password_too_weak: Password is too weak. Please use a stronger password.
sign-in.create.success.title: Account successfully created.
sign-in.create.success.body: You can now set up your personal passkey - the most secure login method available.
passkey.hero.title: Set up your passkey
passkey.hero.subtitle: Sign in with the most secure authentication method available – your personal passkey.
passkey.setup.title: Passkey setup
passkey.setup.subtitle: Create your passkey to protect your account with state-of-the-art security.
passkey.setup.error.generic: Could not create your passkey. Please try again.
passkey.setup.error.user_cancelled: Passkey creation was cancelled. You can try again at any time.
passkey.setup.error.security: Your browser or device blocked the passkey process for security reasons.
passkey.setup.success.complete: Your passkey has been created successfully. You can now sign in securely.
